attributes.action: Make grants available for homeowners to install double glazing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the goverment talk about reducing our energy bill and yet there are no grants available for double glazing to homeowners when double glazing cuts heat lost through windows by half and installing Energy Saving Recommended double glazing can save around £110 a year on your heating bills. Double glazing can save a household around 720kg of carbon dioxide (CO2) a year. there are grants available for cavity wall insulation but this is not suitable for alot of older properties, newer properties are already built with wall insulation. most properties have some form of loft insulation
